comment: He is so friendly and wants everyone to succeed. He is very clear what is going to be on every quiz and grades the lab reports as fairly as possible. I absolutely recommend him and there is no reason not to take him for lab and end up with an A.
Great teacher. So helpful, nice, and understanding. He will do anything to help you get through the class with a good grade. TAKE HIM!

Professor Murphy is one of the nicest professors I have ever had. He is so helpful and wants everyone to do well. The class was not stressful at all, and he made sure to let us know exactly what was going to be on each quiz. I highly recommend taking him for lab.

i had him this semester and I did not stress once about lab the whole time. I knew that if I knew that if i needed help, or if I had a question, he could and would answer it for me. He hasn't really figured out everything in the lab yet, but he knows the way the science works and is ready to teach it. Take this guy, you won't regret it.

Professor Murphy is THE MOST AWESOME lab professor there is at KSU. He's always willing to help out and grades lab very leniently. He wants his students to make A's and it shows. Wish I could take him for every lab. Take him. He's the absolute best.

As a lab professor, I have not a bad thing to say about him. He's fresh out of school and an EXTREMELY nice guy, always there to help, answer any questions. VERY lenient when grading lab reports. VERY lenient about everything. He's very smart and I STRONGLY recommend taking him. Best professor I've ever had. TAKE HIM!!!!
